item.name: Authentication

exec: // Extract access token from response and save to environment variable
console.log('✅ Auth0 token saved to auth0_bearer_token');

request.description:
Obtain Auth0 bearer token for Auburn Kickoff API authentication using MDSi Cloud City Auth0 tenant.

**Environment-Specific URLs:**
- DEV: https://mdsi-cloud-city-dev.auth0.com/oauth/token
- UAT: https://mdsi-cloud-city-uat.auth0.com/oauth/token
- PRD: https://mdsi-cloud-city-prd.auth0.com/oauth/token

**Required Environment Variables:**
- `auth0_token_url`: Full Auth0 token endpoint URL
- `auth0_client_id`: OAuth client ID (environment-specific)
- `auth0_client_secret`: OAuth client secret (provided separately)
- `auth0_audience`: API audience (e.g., https://segra-integration-dev.mdsiinc.com)

**Response:**
The access token is automatically saved to `auth0_bearer_token` environment variable and used for subsequent API requests.

**Token Expiration:**
Tokens expire after 24 hours (86400 seconds). Re-run this request to obtain a fresh token when expired.

request.description:
Submit a Transfer Order to Auburn Kickoff using the flattened array payload structure.

**Payload Structure:** Array of line items (flattened structure)

**Validation Rules:**
- Array cannot be empty
- All TransferOrderNumbers must be identical
- All fields are required

**Test Data (Segra Item Numbers):**
- Segra Item: PHNAVAIP9608G → MDSi translates to: 700507946 (IP TELEPHONE 9608G GRAY GIGABIT ETHERNET)
- Segra Item: 705180505 → MDSi translates to: NC-55-32T16Q4H-AT (CISCO NCS 5500 SERIES 48-PORT LINE CARD)

**Test Locations:**
- 1200Greenbrier: Greenbrier Distribution Center - Charleston, WV (Location ID: 000107284)
- 230NCEDAR: North Cedar Distribution - Knoxville, TN (Location ID: 000107982)
- 320NCedarBluff: Alternative Knoxville location (Location ID: 000107982)
- 5022Hadley: Hadley Distribution - Overland Park, KS (Location ID: 000108082)
- 141528th: West Des Moines, IA (Location ID: 000108085)
- 945Norkolk: Norfolk, VA (Location ID: 000108083)
- 7200Bishop: Plano, TX (Location ID: 000107983)
- 1Lumos: Waynesboro, VA (Lumos Plaza)
- 9380Station: Lone Tree, CO

**Item Number Translation:** Auburn Kickoff receives Segra item numbers. Auburn Wire (downstream) translates them to MDSi manufacturer part numbers.

**Dynamic Variables:**
- {{$timestamp}}: Current Unix timestamp for unique order identification
- {{$randomInt}}: Random integer for external reference numbers

**Response:** HTTP 202 Accepted with acceptance message, transferOrderNumber, correlationId, and lineCount

**CosmosDB Audit:** Logs to war-eagle-db-01/kick-six-express
